ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Belt of Concordance speedup
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok I tested all our speedup songs. My results coincide with yours. (I m rounding off my figures) Normal 36 delay. Warsong 29 delay. Warsong + BoC 20 delay.
ygData.messageBody:
Ok I tested all our speedup songs. My results coincide with yours.

(I'm rounding off my figures)
Normal 36 delay.
Warsong 29 delay. Warsong + BoC 20 delay. *boggle*
Anthem 33 delay. Anthem + BoC 20 delay. *double boggle*
VoC 30 delay. VoC + BoC 20 delay. *yet another boggle*
Berserker 30 delay. Berserker + BoC 20 delay. *and yes, boggle*

Now I won't be able to get my hands on my FBSS anytime soon. If anyone
out there with one would care to do the same tests, that would be nice.
I'm pretty certain the same results will show with any other haste item.
So its either some kind of bug, or simply how its designed.
However, if it were just limited to the BoC, that wouldn't mean a whole
lot anyways. There will never be level 10 bards with 'em to take full
advantage of it and sing Anthem with it, but oh well. Interesting none
the less.

This brings up a gripe, we have a song for expansion that I believe was
posted as +45% attack speed with no stats. Thats utterly useless, much
like SLTW is if you already have a haste item. Perhaps we can get it
altered?

Maev Lorekeeper
Tarew Marr
